text: Nelly Olin (23 March 1941 – 26 October 2017)Val-d'Oise : l'ancienne maire et ministre Nelly Olin est décédée was a French politician. She was a Minister of Environment in France under Dominique de Villepin's government from 2005 through 2007. From 2004 to 2005, Olin was the Minister-Delegate for Social Security. She was a Senator for the Oise department. Olin served as Mayor of Garges-lès-Gonesse and Senator, both offices from 1995 to 2004. Olin died on 26 October 2017 in Paris of complications from breast cancer. She was at age 76. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Paris Category:People from Val-d'Oise
title: Nelly Olin
